abstract: HSBC is considering a bid for a major Chinese bank to reinforce its presence in the country as other foreign lenders retrench, The Sunday Telegraph reported.
snippet: HSBC is considering a bid for a major Chinese bank to reinforce its presence in the country as other foreign lenders retrench, The Sunday Telegraph reported.
lead_paragraph: HSBC  is considering a bid for a major Chinese bank to reinforce its presence in the country as other foreign lenders retrench, The Sunday Telegraph reported, citing unnamed sources.

headline.main: HSBC Said to Consider  China Bank Bid

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
